description: Try our easy to follow Thai Kangaroo Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Kangaroo Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk chilli sauce, lime juice and remaining oil together. Diagonally slice kangaroo, and add to salad. Serve drizzled with dressing.
